attributes.action: Make the Amazing Mrs Pritchard (Jane Horrocks) Prime Minister
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I like her green ideas, especially the one about Green Wednesdays. I think this should deffintely happen.
Also, she seemed to speak to the more common people more in her speechs and wasnt so pompous like all the other primeministers.  
She is what we need to rule the country and save the world :D
Alex Hicks age 15

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
